name: DocumentFragment.querySelector
description: The DocumentFragment.querySelector() method returns the first element, or null if no matches are found, within the DocumentFragment (using depth-first pre-order traversal of the document's nodes) that matches the specified group of selectors.

refs.name: Selectors API Level 2
refs.description: The definition of 'DocumentFragment.querySelector' in Selectors API Level 2.
